org.strabil.math
Class IncompleteGamma

java.lang.Object
  org.strabil.math.IncompleteGamma

public class IncompleteGamma
extends java.lang.Object

In mathematics, the gamma function is defined by a definite integral. The incomplete gamma function is defined as an integral function of the same integrand.

The incomplete Gamma Function P(a,x) is monotonic and (for a greater than one or so) rises from "near-zero" to "near-unity" in a range of x centered on about a-1 and of width about sqr(a).

Author:
Richard Gomes, Dominik Holenstein
See Also:
Incomplete Gamma Function, Incomplete Gamma Function, Numerical Recipes in C, p. 216.
